Originally reported by eng60340 in issue 159 :

Will be good if there's a puzzle mode where the AI is given a set of progressively stronger decks to fight the human.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: add a puzzle mode where the AI deck gets progressively stronger

comments.body:
That sounds more like a tournament mode to me, something that's been requested often and we'd love to add. It's not an easy undertaking and relies on someone finding the time to implement such a thing.

You can maybe tell a bit more about how your idea would work and add that to issue 29 .
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
I'm closing this as duplicate. Let's use issue 29 as a place to gather ideas about what a tournament mode could look like.

Thanks for adding your suggestion eng60340.

**Status:** Duplicate
